page.title: 08A PART-TIME JOB IN JERSEY
page.content:
On Saturday I go to my part-time job at "Grandfare" supermarket. I get up at 7.45 a.m. and get dressed. I put my blue and white checked overall on. I leave home at 8.20 to get to work for 8.30 a.m. In the winter I am all right for if it rains I can quickly run across the road and I am there in less than 5 minutes. When I get there I go and work on the tills but before I open up I get the dustpan and brush out. Then I have to clear up all the mess on the floor and the tops. I always put some extra plastic bags out so that the customers don't have to ask for them. Then when I am ready, I check that the money is in the till, take the chain off the hook and sit on my stool and wait for my first customer.
{by Linda Noel
